resources.string: Sure, an exact Darth Vader replica would make an awesome Halloween costume but itâ€™s probably a little over budget. According to Time, it would cost the average person $18.3 million to make a real-life replica of the infamous black suit that features a voice modifier, breathing apparatus, prosthetic limbs, and an augmented reality filter.
Giraffes are the tallest mammal in the world They can grow up to 5.5 meters! Even new-born giraffes are taller than most humans.
